entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edson Airport 9:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -7

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Flurries near the Swan Hills in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Flurries near the Swan Hills in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
